presentationColumns.name: Arr Delay (Min)
presentationColumns.description: Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival time. Early arrivals are set to 0.

presentationColumns.name: Arr Lag (Min)
presentationColumns.description: Difference in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival time. Early arrival are negative values.

presentationColumns.name: Arr Delay as % of Flight Time
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.Arr Delay as % of Flight Time
presentationColumns.description: Arrival Delay expressed as % of total trip time.

presentationColumns.name: Arr Lag as % of Flight Time
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.Arr Lag as % of Flight Time
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive on time. Note: If you select Origin as a category, you get percent of flights that depart from those airports and arrive on time.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Arr Delay (Min)
presentationColumns.description: Avg of difference in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival time. Early arrivals set to 0.

presentationColumns.name: # of Fl Arr Ontime or Early
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.# of Fl Arr Ontime or Early
presentationColumns.description: Number of flights with 0 minutes delay

presentationColumns.name: # of Fl Arr 1 to 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.# of Fl Arr 1 to 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.description: Number of flights with less of 30 minutes Arrival delay
alternateNames: # of Fl Arr Less than 30 Min Late

presentationColumns.name: # of Fl Arr Over 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.# of Fl Arr Over 30 Min Late
alternateNames: # of Fl Arr over 30 Min Late init

presentationColumns.name: % of Fl Arr 1 to 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% of Fl Arr 1 to 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.description: Percent of flights that arrive with less of 30 minutes Arrival delay.
alternateNames: % of Fl Arr Less than 30 Min Late

presentationColumns.name: % of Fl Arr Over 30 Min Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% of Fl Arr Over 30 Min Late

presentationColumns.name: % of Fl Arr Ontime or Early
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% of Fl Arr Ontime or Early
presentationColumns.description: % of Flights that arrived ontime or early.

presentationColumns.name: % of Fl Arrived Late
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:X0 - Airlines.Flight Facts.% of Fl Arrived Late
